name.ja: <ruby>炎<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>焼<rt>しょう</rt></ruby>

text.en: Target the same number of "Fire King" monsters you control and cards your opponent controls; destroy them. If a "Fire King" card(s) you control would be destroyed by card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use 1 "Fire King Sacred Immolation" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck R: Onslaught of the Fire Kings
